short_description: This function calculates several statistical measures of how likely each pair of items is to be purchased together.
long_description: This function calculates several statistical measures of how likely each pair of items is to be purchased together.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input data to filter.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input data to filter.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the column from the input table which contains the data for filter.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the column from the input table which contains the data for filter.

argument_clauses.name: TransactionIDColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the transactionID column to define groups of items listed in the input columns that are purchased together.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the transactionID column to define groups of items listed in the input columns that are purchased together.

argument_clauses.name: PartitionColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the name of the input table columns on which to partition the input.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the input table columns on which to partition the input.

argument_clauses.name: MaxDistinctItems
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the maximum size of the item set. The default value is 100.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the maximum size of the item set. The default value is 100.
